## Tender Announcement 
### [**WS4279579603**](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18220098?extsite=MTgyMjAwOThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Acquisition of an Electric Programmable Load Bench for the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals to acquire a programmable electric load bench for the Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) in Varennes, Québec, Canada. 

#### Contract Details
* **Contract Reference Number:**  WS4279579603
* **Publication Date:** December 7, 2023
* **Proposal Deadline:** January 23, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* **Contract Start Date Expected**: January 31, 2024

#### Tender Information
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is open to all interested suppliers. The contract will be awarded to the supplier who provides the best value to the Government of Canada. The selection criteria for this procurement are lowest price. 

#### Trade Agreements
This contract is subject to the conditions of the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

#### Deliverables
The successful supplier will deliver the programmable electric load bench, provide on-site training, and offer technical support to NRCan.

#### Contracting Entity
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) represents the Government of Canada in this procurement process.

#### End-User Entity
The end-user of the programmable electric load bench is the Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan).

#### Contact Information
Inquires and proposals should be directed to:
Adina Ayassou
Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)
adina.ayassou@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
